name: Anjul Sahu
body:
Hey! I am Anjul Sahu. I am a database engineer from India with expertise in Oracle Databases, Performance Tuning. I write my blog at <http://oracleninja.wordpress.com>. 


### Open Source Project Contribution
1. **DBCLI** - contribute occasionally 
2. **Panorama** - contribute occasionally
3. SQL Developer Reports

### Skills
* Oracle Database Administration 
  RAC, ASM, Dataguard, VLDB, Advanced tuning & troubleshooting
* E-Business Suite Admin (Apps DBA)
* Microsoft SQL Server 
* Shell Scripts
* R
* Python

### Interest
* Data Science
* Big Data
* Photography
* Node.js 
* Performance Tuning and Visualization Tools
